abilities.description: When you @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.Item.a2d7793b23c17489]{Secure an Advantage} by finding a person with knowledge or experience about a specific topic, you may add +2. If you do, treat a weak hit as miss.

When you @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.Item.05909d6310d209a6]{Make a Connection} with someone who has a favorable relationship with another person you already have connection with, add +1. On a hit, @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.Item.141aec8b92efd14b]{Develop Your Relationship} with your original connection.

When you @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.Item.e6ed148eff82c171]{Face Danger} or @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.Item.a2d7793b23c17489]{Secure an Advantage} by leveraging the fact that you have a relationship with a connection, you may reroll any dice. If you do and score a miss, @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.Item.8704c945023355fb]{Test Your Relationship} when next you communicate with that connection.
